NHMSeedsDescription: Plant these in Winter to grow a Northern Heart Melon. Needs 20 days to grow.
NHMelon.Description: A very rare fruit from a deity's garden that is said to increase a person's fondness towards another.
GlazedHeartMelon.Description: A sweet treat. Gifting it to someone shows that you really like them!
LoveTea.Description: A mysterious beverage that is said to make anyone like you instantly.
Tassel.Description: An equippable accessory (Ring slot). Increases luck, defense and critical stats.
GiftableTassel.Description: A beautiful handcrafted accessory, a token of companionship. Perhaps a certain ancient deity might appreciate this?
GiftedToNotOnAllowListMessage: I am sorry, this isn't really what I like. Why don't you make use of it yourself?
HeartMelonHuangjiu.Description: A type of traditional liquor brewed by mixing boiled grains such as rice, glutinous rice, or millet. This specific one has Northern Heart Melon added in, giving it a distinct flavor.
